_sText:
Ive been wanting to try this out for a while now. I felt like it would make a sick slaughter house and oh boy. 3 hostages 1 in the T spawn which is the sewers lounge room. 2 in the room next to T spawn. CT spawn where Subject 617 spawns.  only a few CT get to spawn on top of the scaffolding. the only thing i added was a manhole decal on the ceiling because hostages have to exit somewhere and Subject 617 spawn is the farthest point. This is my first attempt at porting a map, i couldnt figure out how to transition the textures so i applied what i thought held the atmosphere. maybe someone can help me figure out how to import textures! <3 This map is also stacked 30 vs 30. so... this is also hosted on my server as well dr.N0s Mysterious Slaughter House Classic Source No Weapon Bans.

and let me shout out to the team!
its a real shame they couldnt create the foundation to become a legit mod in steam and last as long as source will. its very wrong and sad but this game will forever go down in history for me as one of thee most original mods that could have ever been created. better than every source mod like left 4 dead team fortress zombie panic all them = nothing to what these cats created. though its beta its still up and still has a few players! so download that tihs and lets play! add me as a friend on steam!
http://www.hidden-source.com/downloads.htm
